events.message: I received my order yesterday but would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The system has categorized the customer issue as a refund request based on the message content.
Support agent Mary has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want a refund so I can process it quickly?
My order number is 12345XYZ. The product arrived but it’s not as described and doesn’t work properly, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process, and you should receive the full amount within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate you handling this so promptly and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the case will be closed after confirmation of receipt by the customer.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ensure everything is satisfactory.
I did receive the refund today. Everything is fine now, thank you very much for your assistance.
The case has been closed following successful refund confirmation and customer satisfaction.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to collect feedback about the support experience and refund process.
